title: Understanding Text Wrapping
text: Text wrapping is a feature that allows text to automatically move to the next line when it reaches the end of a cell or a defined area. This is useful for keeping your data organized and readable.

title: Locating the Wrap Text Button
text: The 'Wrap Text' button is typically found in the 'Home' tab of most spreadsheet applications. It is part of the 'Alignment' group of tools.

title: Identifying the Correct Button
text: Which button is used to wrap text?
